channel.title: Bring back priest with changes
channel.description:
Priest
Unique
unconvertable
Bd Support
day ability - Bind soul - make a player Death immune once (1 use)
Night ability 1 - pray - make the selected play able to be revived with resurrection (infinite uses)
Night ability 2 - Resurrection - bring back a previously prayed upon player back to life as a death knight (1 use)
Death Knight
Unique
bd Killer
Passive rotting - you are death immune and immune to most conversion and redirection you will also die 3 days after being created you may also not vote
Day ability - Undead voice - speak only to the dead today (1 use)
Night ability 1 - Defend - guard a player killing all attackers (2 uses)
Night ability 2 - Undead steel attack a player thy will die in one night from rotting away this cannot be healed (1 use)

item.title: Bring back priest with changes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Navi:

Could abilities that interact with dead players be more viable if everyone who dies gets notified which classes are still alive that can interact with them?

No. Dead interaction is an all or nothing thing. Because you either need enough of it to justify EVERYONE staying, or you don’t bother and let everyone leave. We already tried the former and it didn’t work. The latter is working just fine however.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring back priest with changes
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
In this case, death interaction would work a bit better since players who have had pray used on them could be motivated to stay by being told they can be resurrected.

Could abilities that interact with dead players be more viable if everyone who dies gets notified which classes are still alive that can interact with them?
I know I’d be more willing to stay if I knew that I could become a death knight or could report my last night results to a psychic.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring back priest with changes
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
I think death knight was a bit too powerful in the past so I personally wouldn’t try and bring it back.

While I agree with the problem Wolf pointed out, I also believe that this death knight sounds a lot more powerful and my problem is that it needed nerfing, not buffing.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring back priest with changes
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
I remember when dk was brought back to court. Information from the dead was very valuable. Not sure about now (2 months since I last played) but phys was a POWERHOUSE and the unconvertible dks were really strong. Personally I wouldn’t bring back such a class.

Tell me what you guys think though. DK in the past. Was it good? Able to guard people in the dark. Was it good?

Read full topic
